standard_army.name: Standard Army (Core)
standard_army.description: A well-rounded force for taking on any opponent.

inspired.name: Inspired
inspired.description: Upgrade one Leader model with Inspired.
inspired.flavor: This model inspires the best in those who serve them.

expert_fighter.name: Expert Fighter
expert_fighter.description: Upgrade one Leader model with Expert Fighter.
expert_fighter.flavor: This model has fought in many close quarters fights and survived.

quick_reflexes.name: Quick Reflexes
quick_reflexes.description: Upgrade one Leader model with Quick Reflexes.
quick_reflexes.flavor: This model has expert awareness and can react quickly.

legend_expert_fighter.name: Expert Fighter
legend_expert_fighter.description: This model may make one additional attack with any Melee weapon.

large_shield.name: Large Shield
large_shield.description: This model has +2 Save against ranged attacks and +1 Save against melee attacks.

buckler.name: Buckler
buckler.description: This model has +1 Save against melee attacks. If it's in Skirmisher Formation it also has +1 Save against ranged attacks.

hurled_weapons.name: Hurled Weapons
hurled_weapons.description: When this unit is targeted by an attack with an “Assault“ weapon this unit can make a free Shoot action with this weapon.

overhead_throw.name: Overhead Throw
overhead_throw.description: When Charging; This weapon may engage and fight models up to 1" away. Enemy models count as engaged and must still move into base contact to fight unless they also have reach.

skirmisher_formation.name: Skirmisher Formation
skirmisher_formation.description: This unit has +1 Save against ranged attacks made at long range or at a range of more than 6" and -1 Save against melee attacks.
skirmisher_formation.flavor: This unit is part of a spread out formation, which means it can more easily dodge incoming missiles, but is more vunerable to being rushed by infantry.

vet_skirmisher_formation.name: Veteran Skirmishers
vet_skirmisher_formation.description: This unit has +1 Save against ranged attacks made at long range or at a range of more than 6" and -1 Save against melee attacks. It has +1 Initiative when rushing.
vet_skirmisher_formation.flavor: This unit is part of a spread out formation, which means it can more easily dodge incoming missiles, but is more vunerable to being rushed by infantry.

light_infantry.name: Light Infantry
light_infantry.description: (This unit cannot use the "Spearmen" special rule) When this unit is deployed, arrives from reserves or makes a Move or Evade action it can choose to gain or lose Skirmisher Formation (+1 Save against ranged attacks made at long range or at a range of more than 6“ and -1 Save against melee attacks) until the end of the game.
light_infantry.flavor: This unit can choose to fight as skirmishers as a loose formation, or 'close up' to fight as traditional infantry.

light_cavalry.name: Light Cavalry
light_cavalry.description: When this unit is deployed, arrives from reserves or makes a Move or Evade action it can choose to gain or lose Skirmisher Formation (+1 Save against ranged attacks made at long range or at a range of more than 6“, -1 Save against melee attacks and +1 Initiative when rushing) until the end of the game.
light_cavalry.flavor: This unit can choose to fight as skirmishers as a loose formation, or 'close up' to fight as medium cavalry.

warband.name: Warband
warband.description: +1 Strength when attacking falling back units but -1 Save when falling back themselves.
warband.flavor: Warbands are units that due to a lack of professional training, are overconfident in the chase or while being fired upon, but are filled with fear when being chased or seeing the blood of their fellow countrymen.

if_it_bleeds.name: If It Bleeds
if_it_bleeds.description: This unit gains one less shock for being hit by an attack but gains two shock for losing one or more models during an attack.
if_it_bleeds.flavor: Warbands are units that due to a lack of professional training, are overconfident in the chase or while being fired upon, but are filled with fear when being chased or seeing the blood of their fellow countrymen.

light_footed.name: Light Footed
light_footed.flavor: With less armor and no shield to weigh them down, these men can be quite nimble.

furious_charge.name: Furious Charge
furious_charge.description: (Requires War Horse) Enemy units charged by this unit are assigned 1 additional shock if the attack hits.
furious_charge.flavor: The fury of heavy cavalry was terrifying to those not prepared for the loud pounding of hooves and for the sheer weight of the charge.

superior_cavalry.name: Superior Cavalry
superior_cavalry.description: (Requires Horse or War Horse) This unit may re-roll failed Strength tests when charging or making a Fight reaction when being charged.

mount_horse.name: Mounted (Horse)
mount_horse.description: Increase this model's Movement by 2", unless the unit is save 9 (Melee or Ranged), in which case movement increases by only 1". This model may dismount at the end of any Move action. A model that has dismounted may no longer remount.

war_horse.name: War Horse (Destrier/Stallion)
war_horse.description: Increase this model's Movement by 2", unless the unit is save 9 (Melee or Ranged), in which case movement increases by only 1". This model may dismount at the end of any Move action. A model that has dismounted may no longer remount. This model gets an additional Melee attack with AP0.

travel_horse.name: Travel Horse (Courser/Pony)
travel_horse.description: This model has -1 Save against ranged attacks but has +2" Movement. Models with the "Light Infantry" special rule and in Skirmish Formation gain +1 Initiative when rushing. This model may dismount at the end of a Move action. A model that has dismounted may no longer remount.

army_general.name: Army General
army_general.description: Friendly units within 12' of this unit do not experience 'Warband'.

half_horse_armor.name: Half Horse Armor
half_horse_armor.description: This unit has +1 Save against attacks from units that are being charged or attacked by this unit.

cloth_horse_armor.name: Cloth Horse Armor
cloth_horse_armor.description: This model has +1 Save against melee attacks.

field_orders.name: Field Orders
field_orders.description:
When this unit is activated, choose X friendly Infantry units within 6" to receive one of the following bonuses: 
* Re-roll Accuracy rolls of 9+ 
* Re-roll Strength rolls of 9+ 
* +3" Movement 

A unit may only benefit from one Field Order.

fierce.name: Fierce
fierce.description: If an enemy unit within Movement range fails a break test or falls back this unit has to charge them if possible. If this unit fights this way they gain +1 Strength for that attack.
fierce.flavor: During the early Dark Ages, some units were exceptionally eager to 'run down' or 'run through' the enemy.

saint.name: Saint
saint.description: Friendly units of X types within 6'' may re-roll a single failed Courage test when removing Shock.

man_of_god.name: Man of God
man_of_god.description: This model's unit may re-roll any failed Courage test when removing Shock once per turn.

spearmen.name: Spearmen
spearmen.description: (Requires Spear, shield and to be unmounted) Should this unit do a 'Hold' action and be charged before it's next turn, it has +1 Strength when performing an Attack reaction and ignores the enemy “Warrior Culture“ special rule.

pike.name: Pike
pike.description: Should this unit be charged, it has +1 Strength when performing a Counter-Attack reaction and it gets to attack first.

impale.name: Impale
impale.description: (Requires Horse or War Horse) This weapon gets +1 AP when used during a Charge.

joust.name: Joust
joust.description: (Requires Horse or War Horse) This weapon gets +2 AP when used during a Charge.

warrior_culture.name: Warrior Culture
warrior_culture.description: This model gets +1 Strength when using a weapon without the "Reach" special rule when charging.

mount_warrior_culture.name: Horseman Warrior Culture
mount_warrior_culture.description: (Requires Horse or War Horse) This model gets +1 Strength when charging.

light_spearmen.name: Light Spearmen
light_spearmen.description: (Requires Spear, shield and to be unmounted) Should this unit do a 'Hold' action and be charged by a _Cavalry_ unit before it's next turn, it has +1 Strength when performing an Attack reaction and ignores the enemy “Horseman Warrior Culture“ special rule.

light_professional_swordsmen.name: Light Professional Swordsmen
light_professional_swordsmen.description: (Requires Spatha and to be unmounted) Should this unit do a 'Hold' action and be charged before it's next turn, it has +1 Save against that attack and ignores the enemy “Warrior Culture“ special rule.
